mdRecord.dcterms:title: West View, Mount Vernon Mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the west front of the Mansion from the south serpentine path. View includes the Mansion circle, marble sundial, hitching post and colonnades. Text printed on the reverse reads: West View, Mount Vernon Mansion. Copyrighted by Luke C. Dillon , Photographer to Mt. Vernon. Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, Washington, D. C. A penciled handwritten note reads, 'Deposited by Mrs. Carpenter 1934. Presented by Mrs. Cyrus Bentley, Chicago.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion exterior
p Mansion circle
p Serpentine walks
